title: What Are the Default Paths for Saving Pictures and Videos? Can I Change the Paths?
answer:
When the preferred saving location is set to the phone's internal memory, the photos and
videos are saved in the Camera folder under > File Manager > Internal > DCIM.
When the preferred saving location is the microSD card, the photos and videos are saved in
the Camera folder under  > File Manager > SD card > DCIM.

 

 

 

 

The preferred saving locations for photos and videos are both the phone memory. To set
the preferred saving location, open Camera, touch Settings > Preferred save location,
and select Memory card or Internal storage. If there is no available storage space in
the default saving location, photos and videos will be saved under the non-default path,
as shown in the following figure.
